posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I'm Currently working on the NY Giants T-206 team set and I would love to fill in a few of the gaps on here. I've made one deal on the forum so far on the forum and it went really smoothly. I strongly prefer the SGC holder.


Anyway here is the want list: looking to stick around the 2-3ish range

Red Ames hand at chest 
Red Ames hand above head  
Al Bridwell cap
Doc Crandall no cap
Mike Donlin Seated 
Moose McCormick 
Larry Doyle Portrait 
Rube Marquard Follow Through 
Christy Mathewson White Cap
John McGraw portrait with cap
Fred Merkle Portrait 
Admiral Schlei Portrait 

Thanks for looking and hopefully we can work out a couple of deals

I've got a Merkle throwing, scratch that, it's raw. Would likely grade out a 20 though, it's pretty nice

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-G925A using Tapatalk
